__e: We just live there now, so we, Joel and I, went by there before...
I wanted you to know also, just, Joel and I both, we were so moved by the way that you reached out.
Joel, I just found my family after all these years. Yeah...?
You know, Joel, I have to say I am very disappointed with what's going on here.
